text: I decided to come to the HPS program
because it's a great opportunity for us
as NFL players to take advantage of what
they offer us you know the Harvard
Business School in the NFL combining to
give us a great opportunity to learn
through this whole week case studies
real life situations financial
statements and just to really and get
indulged in the business side of the
world because we get so wrapped up in
football that it's good to be able to
have this and especially the awesome
university like Auburn we have great
contact with the harvard business school
professors their hands on with us every
day they're available for questions
anytime you know we need them and they
give us their email whatever we need
there there there for us each and every
day and it's an awesome opportunity to
get to learn front and center from one
of the some of the best professors in
the country the way HBS does it with all
the group sessions and get to come
together and and correspond with the
other players here it's an awesome
opportunity for us to hear their
opinions to just come together put our
thoughts together as one and kind of see
what other guys are thinking you know
and it's an awesome opportunity though
for us to to talk to MBA students here
they've helped us tremendously through
this a lot of bright kids and this is
really a great opportunity for us to
take advantage of this and learn a lot
of stuff to help us for life after
football what I'm thinking about for
life after football is just being on the
right track to not to plan ahead you
know I still want to continue my career
with the Cincinnati Bengals right now
you know and I feel like I have years
left for football but you never know you
never know what's going to happen and I
want to plan ahead and right now I have
a couple businesses starting at the
University of Toledo to sports bars
opening up one on campus so a lot of
exciting things happening and what a way
to get here and learn how people how
students in the past I've done things
through business plans and so forth and
I
think the bar business is what I want to
get into after football but it's a good
start to be a manager to help learn and
continue my learning progress so I can
eventually maybe run a company one day
or be an entrepreneur come up with
something different or so it's a great
great you know event for us to get here
and learn different things well I think
the number one thing I would tell up
upcoming players college kids is get
your degree I mean you never know what's
going to happen with football I have my
degree in marketing and management from
University of Toledo you never know
what's going to happen you always need
something to fall back on and I think
even NFL players now take advantage of
this why why not you know the NFL HBS
offers such a great program for us that
we need to take advantage of it
